timeline.bodyText: Would it make more sense to initialize this.validators as an empty List in this case? Unless the distinction between an empty validators and a null validators matters, I think that we could prevent complications down the line if we reduce the number of null values which our codebase permits.
timeline.author: kentmorrissey

replies.bodyText: I do like the idea of empty list better. It seems the unit tests pass with empty list initialization so that seems to work. Initially I was trying to avoid the NPE.
replies.author: shaundmorris

timeline.message: DDF-6221 initialize validators to an empty list in  MatchAnyValidator
DDF-6221 made AttributeValidator list dependency optional
